description:
As a User I want to use my railcards
so that I can travel cheaper

elements.name: Direct train live info
elements.description:
Acceptance criteria 1
I have searched for a single journey from London to Manchester leaving in 2 hours (direct) 
I open up the journey legs And I tap on 'show stops' or similar against the journey (not sure of the design while writing) 
I can see the individual journey stops of the outbound journey, the scheduled  and real time arrival times at each stop on the way

steps.name: I am not logged into the system
I am on the "Home" page
I click on the "Buy Tickets" button
go to the search results for the following journey:
accept the alert message
I should see the "Out Search Results" screen
I expand item No.1 from the "Search Results" table
I should see the "Live Progress BT" screen
the following labels are shown:
I click on the "Collapse" button
I should see the "Hunts Cross" text is shown

elements.name: Live train direct info for second leg
elements.description:
Acceptance criteria 3
I have searched for a return journey from London to St. Ives (indirect) 
I open up the journey legs on the return leg 
I tap on 'show stops' against the second leg (not sure of the design while writing) 
I can see the individual journey stops of the second leg of the journey journey, the scheduled  and real time arrival times at each stop on the way

name: Live progress in buy tickets results
description:
This change will allow a user to see the live progress of journeys shown in buy tickets. UI to be confirmed. To achieve this we will need to have implemented #57 and will need to sent the request for the Trip with a realtime flag. Realtime queries should just be sent on the day
_In due course we will need to replace this, as this is a coupling to IPTIS which we are migrating away from. _
Note
check when to make the Triprequest and Live Progress calls

elements.name: RTJP - Seats left for iOS
elements.description:
As an advanced ticket purchaser looking for the best deal
I want to know if there are only a few seats left for advanced tickets
So that i can make a more spontaneous decision to buy

steps.name: I am not logged into the system
I am on the "Journey Search" page
I go to the search results for the following journey:
accept the alert message
proceed search results to the payment screen
I should see the "Payment" screen
I click on the "More ticket options" element
I should see the "Select Ticket" screen
the "Advance" text is shown
the "Seats Left" field is visible
the "Seats Left" field text matches one of the following patterns:

cells: Limited seats left at this price
